text: AWS Verified Access is a connectivity service
that helps enterprises secure users access
to corporate applications.
It removes the need for a VPN,
which simplifies the connectivity experience for end users
and reduces the management complexity for IT administrators.
Built on AWS zero trust guiding principles,
Verified Access maintains a high level of security
by validating each and every application request
before it grants access.
IT administrators can use this service
to build a unified set of fine-grained policies in minutes.
These policies define a user's ability
to access each application
and verify each access request in real time,
reducing the risks associated with remote connectivity.
Helping verify users against specific security requirements,
Verified Access integrates with the major third party
identity and device security services
that corporations already trust.
Set up simplified and secure global connectivity today
with AWS Verified Access.
(upbeat music)
